◀ rebecca rui

We Construct

An interactive installation, inviting people to playfully (re)write a social contract with each other.

and watch it evolve into the space into cacophony of voices

  • In collaboration with Toni Brell.
  • Shown at the exhibition Declaring Reason, Museum Meermanno, The Hague, The Netherlands, 2017.
◀ Bureaucracy Complex Lecture Series Posters ▶
